text:
Supplementary Material

Supplementary Figures

Figure S1. Report frequencies of gene-associated ARVDILI in PubMed and Scopus databases. The reports were searched up to 14 January 2022 and separated according to studied ethnicity.

Figure S2. Protein-protein interaction network of the gene associated ARVDILI with high interaction score of higher than 0.7. Each node represents each protein in this pathway.

Figure S3. Funnel plot of the comparison between CYP2B6 variance and wild-type and the susceptibility of EFV-induced liver injury from 3 publications. (A) Funnel plot of the comparison between CYP2B6 *1/*1 and *1/*6. (B) Funnel plot of the comparison between CYP2B6 *1/*1 and *6/*6. (C) Funnel plot of the comparison between CYP2B6 *1/*1 and *1/*6 plus *6/*6

Figure S4. Funnel plot of the comparison between CYP2B6 variance and wild-type and the susceptibility of NVP-induced liver injury from 2 publications. (A) Funnel plot of the comparison between CYP2B6 *1/*1 and *1/*6. (B) Funnel plot of the comparison between CYP2B6 *1/*1 and *6/*6. (C) Funnel plot of the comparison between CYP2B6 *1/*1 and *1/*6 plus *6/*6
